1.content:
Three country:

The America- set in the universe where the confederate states of America beats the Union. The states became separate entities and the confederacy were recognized as the solemn country within.

The Ussr-set in universe where the Soviet Union never collapsed. It continues as the 2nd strongest country in the world and the Cold War drags on.

Imperial Japan- set in the universe where the imperial Japan won the ww2. It became modernized but it still have the militaristic, ultra-nationalist ideas.

Who shall you follow in?
1.title: Which country?

11.content: Are you a unionists, or a confederate?
11.title: The side

111.content:
The year was 2018 and you were patrolling the border between union and confederate states. Your name is Alex McDonna, an union soldier who have a job as a patrolling officer between the union and the confederate states. In this universe, the confederate states beat the union and became separate entity from it, becoming officially an independent states. The government between the two talked as the America became bigger, southern states and half of California and Hawaii became part of confederate states.

“Has, I’m bored.” You murmured.

Just then you saw an confederate patrol officer looking at you then snickered. You ignored it as you’ve got used to it.

Just then you saw...
111.title: Patriots of union

12.content:
In one of the city Of ussr, you were speaking a propaganda through the mike. Your name was Vladimir Anastasia, an propagandist who works in the ministry of propaganda for Moscow. In this universes the Soviet Union never fell and the Eastern Europe were still strong.

“With power of the soviets, we will vanquish the power of America.” You said.

After that you leaned back and one of the co-worker care in and handed you over a cup of coffee. You took some sip and noticed some Irish cream mixed and some sugar. You were elite enough of own a car, a house and some good stuff that’s not normally handed down to normal people.

“Tastes good.” You said.

You then took ten minutes break and went to break room and noticed..
12.title: Ussr

choices: No one, you simply resume walking.
121.content:
In the break room you saw Dima Bogomirov, your boss. He looked at you and said.

"Ah, Vladimir you're just the person I wanted to talk to."

"What is it Mr. Dima?" you ask.

"All preparations for the ceremony tomorrow are ready. Tomorrow you celebrate "10 years of venerable service to the union". You should be proud comrade Vladimir." He answers.

"I am proud, it is a great honor. I promise to wear the title with pride" you say.

"Of course you will. Now, I don't usually do this kind of thing, but I've decided to give you the rest of the day off so you can prepare yourself for the ceremony." He said.

"But... But comrade Dima, I haven't finished my propaganda broadcast for today." You say.

"Vladimir, I am using my position of authority to order you to take the day off." He said.

"Of course Dima, I'll take the day off." You say

After saying goodbye to your boss you head out from your workplace. Outside every building was perfectly simetrical and aligned in the most efficient manner. It was beautiful, you tell yourself, the ugly, chaotic houses of the Americans could never compare, you think.

Along the way you bump into...
121.title: Venerable service

1211.content:
it was your best buddy viktor, who were with you since you two were in elementary school. you two greeted with handshake and then hand salute to each other. you and viktor went to the military but the higher ups wanted you to become part of the ministry of propaganda since your father was famous for painting and speaking perfect propaganda.

"viktor, havent seen you for while! tell me, what rank are you now?" you asked.

"commander now, anastasia." viktor replied

you noded and asked if he wanted to go out for a lunch and he agreed upon it, as you two walked you two looked at the houses. it was truly beautiful, unlike those dirty americans with their greedy capitalist ways, you thought. as you two reached the restaurant you two noticed....
1211.title: comrades to comrades

12111.content:
It was an American who took refuge in Soviet Union after his country thought he was an terrorrist so he was under the black list. The soviet government accepted his refuge as long as he does not betray their trust.

“Ah, mr...Lovechild. How is your new life in this great Soviet nation?” You asked.

“People are still skeptical about me, but thanks to the job I’ve got and apartment I’m living, I’m doing fairly good.” He said.

“Good. I’m glad it fits your mood. Our nation never fell because of the will of the people. Remember that always.” You said.

He nodded, and bid farewell to you two and left. Both you and viktor went to the restaurant and ordered some food. As you two waited, viktor noticed two KGB coming in for some coffee. You and viktor saluted to them and they nodded and went to one of the seats.

“I’ll never betray my homeland, comrade Anastasia.” Viktor said.

“”Same here. Because of chairman ivanov that makes the Soviet Union stronger everyday.” You replied.

Just then, the order came as it was borscht, pelmeni, Sbiten and pirozhki. You cheered with the Sbiten and started to eat the food. As you are eating, you saw few more people coming in and you talked to viktor about daily life.

You looked at the tv and saw..
12111.title: The old refugee

121111.content:
It was an news and the anchorman was on the chair ready for the next topic to speak.

“We have a news that the 5 year planned economy have reached its quota and both the workers and peasants are joyful to see that they have met the quota. This shows the might of the power of the Soviet Union.” Anchorman said, “we now go to the reporter for the scene.”

You and viktor were happy to hear the good news as they saw the interview were nice between the reporter and the peasants. The peasants sang the Soviet anthem as it shifted back to the anchorman.

“Delightful. In other news, the United States have increased their military power by creating more tanks, airships and recruiting more young men’s...”

“This damn Americans, why wouldn’t they just admit our country is better then they are.” Viktor said.

“Don’t worry comrade. I can assure you they’re just pretending to be tough but they are weak at heart.” You replied.

“I guess your right. We have chairman ivanov on our side.” Viktor replied with smile.

With that, you two finished the food, paid it and went separate ways as you went home to prepare for your ceremony for tomorrow.
121111.title: Propaganda news

1211111.content:
Next day approached, and you got up from the bed and gotten ready for the parade. As you put the pants on, your phone rang and you picked it up.

“Hello?” You spoke.

“Ah, comrade Vladimir. It is me, your boss.” Voice spoke.

“Good morning comrade Dima.” You responded.

“Good to hear. The car shall come to your apartment in 15 minutes so get dressed and eat. I’ll see you at the square.” Dima said.

“Yes sir.” You replied.

You bid farewell and hanged up the phone. You got some left over meat from other day and reheated it. Once finished eating it you gotten your cloth fully ready with medal for labor valor on her chest. She got out and waited then saw a car stopping and a man got out.

“Are you Vladimir Alexandria?” Man asked.

“Yes I am.” You replied.

“Alright get in. Mr.dima ordered me to get you to the square.” He replied.

You nodded and went in and drove off. You looked at the good buildings and apartments, knowing that these were payed by the state so it’s free for workers to live in. 45 minutes passed and you reached the square. It was not as big as the red square in Moscow, but it was decently big. You two got out and saw many people and the workers cheering at you and clapping their hands as you walked with smile, you saw me.dima and saluted to him.

“Good to see you, comrade dima.” You said.

“Same here, now you will be riding on the open car as the parade hits start.” He replied.

You nodded and walked with him toward the car. It was good one and as you sat down, mr.dima told you he have business and left the scene. 10 minutes later, the voice from speaker came on,

“Today we will celebrate comrade alexandrias 10th anniversary for great achievement in Labour. Let the parade start now.” Voice spoke.

The music started and there were marching workers and some military officials marching. When it was your turn the car started to run slow and you got up and waved as the townspeople were applauding and whistling at you from the cheer. You were happy to see this and after 2 hours of parade you were at the podium with mr.dima at the opposite side.

“Vladimir Alexandria. For your 10th anniversary to your dedication, we shall reward you with the medal for distinguished Labour.” Mr.Dima said.

He than put the medal on her chest and saluted to you. You saluted back to him and as the parade was about to end, you noticed someone come near.

It was...
1211111.title: The parade.

12111111.content:
“Zdrast-vuj-tye Alexandria!”

It was your uncle Vladimir Oleg! He was the one who put you into the propaganda announcing business in the beginning! Both you and Oleg hugged and smiled.

“Zdrast-Vijay-tye uncle Oleg! I’m glad your here!” You said in happy tone.

“And I’m glad you have gotten the medal!” He replied, touching your medal, “look at this, my big brothers daughter, now known to this town as the part of the workers hero!”

He than scuffed at your hair as you giggled and telling him to stop, you two heard someone coughing and you two turned around to see a two men’s in uniform. It was a KGB officers and both you and Oleg saluted to them as they were not to be messed with.

“Zdrast-vijay-tye comrades. How can we help you two?” Oleg asked.

“I have heard one of this towns worker have been awarded with the medal.” One of the KGB officer spoke, then turned to you with the medal, “is this young lady the one?”

“Y-yes she is comrade. What do the officers like you two will need with her?” Oleg asked.

You were little in fear as you have heard rumors from your friend vicktor that if someone pissed them off, they would be killed secretly. The other officer digged through his carrying suit case and took out an paper that had some words on it.

“Comrades, By the order of comrade premier ivanov, we will ask her to move from this town to Moscow to become there propaganda broadcast speaker.” He said.

you couldn’t believe what he said: you? The propaganda broadcaster in the capital of the USSR? You almost had a nervous breakdown by this and looked at your uncle, and even he was excited to hear this.

“My niece Alexandria! You have now became more then just a simple broadcaster in this town now!” Oleg spoke with some tears, “you will now give your talented voice to the motherland through our capital city!”

“Yes, yes uncle Oleg! I will do my best to become better there!” You replied, now you know you’ll become more then meets the eye.

“You will be transferred in week later.” Officer spoke, “until then, Nu togda do svidanya.”

They then left the scene, making you two hug in happiness, then went to your boss to tell him what’s going on and once you two got to him, your uncle told him what’s going on and he smiled at you.

“I’m glad to hear that comrade Vladimir. Your now a city girl now. Make me and this town proud.” Mr.Dima said.

“Yes, comrade dima! I will make this town proud!” You replied, saluting to him.

He saluted to you back and Oleg gave you a car ride home so you can get your bag ready for moving..
12111111.title: Happy uncle

1213.content:
You met with nobody and resumed back to your home. It was an apartment that were in good condition with air ventilation system, kitchen, dining, living and sleeping rooms. Once you got back in and packed your stuff down you turned on the tv and looked at the state owned news.

“With the might of the Soviet power, we can overcome the struggle!” Anchorman said.

You sighed and watched it for 30 minutes then gotten ready for tomorrow’s ceremony. You’ve got your military suits on the wall since you served the military for 4 years before turning into propagandist. You had some medals from medal of honorable service to Soviet military, order of “service to the homelands in the armed forces of Ussr”, and order of Labour Glory.

“I’m so glad I joined the service.” You said.

You put the medals to the sides of the military suite and started to cook dinner until someone knocked on your door. You opened the door and it was..
1213.title: way back home

12133.content:
It was an Soviet KGB. You didn’t know why they were here as you did do good deeds in the past and doing good job as the propaganda broadcaster.

“Hello gentlemen, what’s the reason for you two to be here?” You asked.

“The state have heared about your excellence in the propaganda broadcast field, so the premier of the union wants to see you next week to honor your work.” One of KGB told you.

You were stunned and honored as you never seen the premier face to face. You smiled and asked if they want to come in, but they declined, saying they have job to take care of. One of the KGB took out the sheet of paper and handed toward you.

“This is the notification of when you’ll come to Moscow and meet the primier.” Officer said.

You thanked them and they saluted and left the area. You turned around and looked at the note, saying the meeting will occur next week at Moscow and you’ll be escorted to the kremlin where you’ll see him. You smiled and was honored to see him for first time.

“This will be great. I just know it.” You said.

You then gotten ready to eat lunch as you took out some bread and left over soup you had other day. You cooked the soup and once it was heated up, you took it to the dining room and turned on the state run radio that had some good music.

“Thanks for the meal.” You said.

You then started to eat lunch slowly as you enjoyed the music...
12133.title: Propagandist approval

13.content:
The year was 2017 and you just got off from work. Your name is Takeshi Ooyama, an average Japanese saleryman living in the heart of Shibuya district of Tokyo Japan. In this timeline, the imperial Japan somehow won the war against the allies, avoiding the atomic bomb by using a special technology to curve the bombs way. The allies realized it was next to impossible to stop the Japanese influence so they retreated, surrendering to the Japanese. Since then Japan managed to dominate China, Vietnam, and the islands. You are a descendant of low class samurai family and you had no problem with finances. It was because of your wits and your family’s business experience that made your family well known family. As you got out, one of the male employee came next to you.

“Hey Ooyama, nice work today!” Employee spoke.

“Oh, nice work today Tooru.” You spoke.

His name was tooru Akisuke, another average man who happens to have military background. You had thoughts on joining the imperial army but because you were little overweight the recruiter rejected you.

“Say Ooyama, want to get some beer?” Tooru offered

You thought for moment and you had nothing else to do so you took the offering. You two went to one of the izakaya pub and once inside you two ordered the mug of beer.

As you two waited, you two noticed...
13.title: Alternate japan

132.content:
It was an government worker. In this timeline, being part of the government was an honor to work since it had strong influence with the emperor itself. You noticed that the worker were pissed drunk and paid for his drinks and left the izakaya. you sighed in relief as if you or tooru made a word about the worker, he might damage your reputation and stain your name. you took some beer and breathed out with sigh while tooru wondered whats going on.

"hey ooyama, whats up? something wrong?" Tooru asked

"Its just...that sometime life can be a bitch sometime." You replied.

"True. the sumo federation allowing women wrestlers to compete, female geisha are more popular then onnagata, and even we have an empress as our new head leader." Tooru replied.

You took another sip of beer. you didnt mind letting women getting more power yet somehow you had the instinct that something is going to happen that will harm the nation in the future if something happens, then the news caster spoke.

"on the next news, empress taiki will meet the empress of Japanese democratic autonomous nation of china to discuss about the future relation between china and the empire of japan itself, empress taiki will be pleased to see the chinese empress since the last time they met were 2 years ago,"

You sighed and your orders came and had some oden,,,
132.title: Government worker

1321.content:
Next day arose and you got your business suit on and went out of your apartment. Once you got to the subway you noticed few imperial officers standing at the station gate. One was a female officer and she was tall as they were talking to one man.

“And you dare attempt to harass not only the government worker, but me as well? You got nerves, You unforgivable gaijin.” Officer spoke.

“And Who’s being my boss lady!? Outta my way!” Man spoke in anger.

Before he could move, the female officer took out an metal stick and whipped his face hard. The man fell and the male officer took out the same stick and beats him as she did the same.

“Harassment is crime, you hound! Always remember that!” Female said.

“Ouch, stop! Forgive me!” Man shouted in pain.

After few pounding the officers stopped and grabbed his shoulders, taking him custody. They passed you and you were just silent as you didn’t want to get involved and you just went toward your work. 30 minutes later you arrived at your work and got to your desk, and saw Tooru come in as well and sat next to you.

“What’s up? Something happened?” Tooru asked.

You...
1321.title: next day,,,

13211.content:
“Well, I saw a foreign man beaten up by the military official.” You said.

“Oh man, that’s a big no-no in our country.” Tooru said, “did you say something?”

“No, I didn’t want to get involved.” You replied.

“Oh well, at least your not in trouble. Hate to see ya go to the detention center.” Tooru said, cracking his fingers.

“You got that right.” You replied, “let’s start working.”

Tooru nodded and the workers stood up as the boss came in, he talked about meeting the expectations and such, and after that both you and Tooru started to work. It was mostly desk work as you were a guy who does the business trade sorties and correcting the orders.

The long hours passed and it was lunchtime. You went to the lounge and took out...
13211.title: Day at work

132112.content:
It was an store-bought onigiri and zangi chickens. You started to eat one of the onigiri and looked at the tv and noticed the news cast were on about the empresses between Japan and China meeting.

“Oh man, wish I was one of the government worker.” You thought.

You sighed and continued to eat your lunch. After 1 hour break you went back to your desk and noticed Tooru had tissue on his nose.

“What happened?” You asked.

“I tripped and fell, that’s all.” Tooru responded.

“I see.” You replied.

You two resumes the job...
132112.title: Three onigiris and zangi

1321121.content:
At the heart of Beijing where the forbidden palace, empress Taiki came to the throne room with her bodyguard to see the empress of the Japanese democratic autonomous nation of China, she saw the empress herself. Her name was Wu Liang, the supposed lineage to empress wu zetian.

“Ah, empress Taiki. I haven’t seen you for while.” Wu Liang said.

“So am I, empress Wu.” Taiki replied, “you know why I’m here.

“For the discussion about the economy, Yes?” Wu Liang said.

Taiki nodded and Wu Liang stood up and called her bodyguard as they came, they came to her area.

“You know that half of my countrymen still loath your occupation in my land, you see? I couldn’t even talk about the economy with their rebellion.” Empress Wu said.

“And you know my military can took care of those pesky rebellion with help of diet Congress.” Taiki replied.

“Yes, but the communists are still not giving in.” Empress Wu said.

This made Taiki think for moment. The Chinese communists still existed in this timeline and they refused to bow down to the empresses or the Japanese government who rules the land. Taiki, who were half nationalist in her heart, took empresses hand.

“I shall eradicate them like bugs in the summer. Just you wait,” Taiki said, “now, for the economy...”

They went on to the meeting hall for the discussion.

Back in Japan, you were working hard until you heard someone breaking a cup filled with coffee. You looked over and saw the man in worried state.

“Oh no, what should I do?!” Man said.

Just then, his higher up came and noticed this and gotten angry. You feared as your rank in the office were not low, but cannot complain that much or defend him.

“Gouki! This is third time you broke the cup!! Why do you do this all the time!?” Man said in rage.

“I’m so sorry mr. majima! I won’t do it again!” Lower guy replied bowing.

“You know your working here in the name of the empress and our nation! Screw it again and your in big trouble! Now clean up!” Man said.

“Yes sir!” He replied, dashing off to get mop and bucket.

You took breather that it wasn’t you then the higher up looked at you and you quickly went back to your work...
1321121.title: Meeting with the empress of china

13211211.content:
The work was done, and you stretched and gotten ready to go home. Your home were not that far away but it was little bit shabby apartment. Tooru came to you with a smile on his face.

“Hey Ooyama! Wanna get oden tonight?” Tooru asked.

“Not tonight, my budgets is kinda tight.” You replied.

“But you’re from lower samurai class! Isn’t budget not your concern?” Tooru asked.

“Hey! Even I have problem with money. Now excuse me please.” You said.

You went and went out of the building. The surrounding were like normal, but it feels like Japan stuck in the past. It felt as if Japanese government were keeping the citizens in the 60’s. You didn’t argue as you got free healthcare, medical checkup, and regular salary. As you got to the train station, you bought the ticket and went on the train and saw....
13211211.title: Hard work done

14.content: The alternative timeline when North Korea won the Korean War
14.title: Option

141.content:
In October of 1952, the tide have turned against the us and South Korean soldiers as the joint North Korean Chinese soldiers became powerful, they finally pushed forward the southern army back to the point they realized it was futil. In 1953, North Korea took the last of the South Korean defense and won the war. There were many casualties but the North Korean soldiers shouted in victory.

The citizens of North Korea were joyous by the victory as the South Korean government surrendered, both government signed the treaty, ending the war and the Korea were now united under the North Korean leader. The soviets and the Chinese congratulated the leaders, even the Eastern European government congratulated the government for the victory.
141.title: Let’s go

15.content: The alternative line where Hokkaido empire never collapse?
15.title: Option

151.content:
In the 1860’s, the rebellious government of Ezo republic was thought to immediate end by imperial rule, but with help of United States and other allies, the rebellion worked, and the imperialist Japan were defeated by the Ezo rebellion. It installed its own democracy thanks to U.S., the republic of Ezo flourished into populated land nearing Tokyo. The Ainu people were given fair treatment, the ordinary people had the right to vote, and their economy grew by the day.

By the 1940’s, the republic was against the war, and didn’t participate in it. It saddened to the government that two atomic bombs were dropped in Hiroshima and Nagasaki, but the president blamed the government of Tokyo for this outcome. After decades, the economy were bit shaky, but with strong hands, the republic of Ezos economy were envious to other nations due to low debt and high growth rate.

This is the story of republic of Ezo.
151.title: Ezo republic rule

152.content: what if the roman empire never collapsed?
152.title: no

1522.content: what if japan were divided into two?
1522.title: no
